org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.utils

Class Localization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.utils.Localization

  • @NonNullByDefault
public class Localization
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class for dealing with localization. It provides the following methods:
    • getText(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) returns the localized message.

    Author:
    Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText(java.lang.String key,
                                java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Converts a given message into an equivalent localized message.
        Parameters:
        key - the message of type String to be converted,
        arguments - (optional) arguments being referenced within the messageString.
        Returns:
        localizedMessageString the resulted message of type String.
